com.epam.ja.kmw.dao

Interface BookDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookDaoImpl

    public interface BookDao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAllBooks(List<Book> listOfBooks)
      Adds to database list of books and returns true.
      boolean addBook(Book book)
      Adds to database a book and returns true.
      boolean delBook(int bookId)
      Deletes a book stored in a database and which ID is sent as an argument and returns false.
      List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Returned container is a list of Book class objects stored in a database.
      List<Book> getAllBooksForOneBookStore(String bookStoreName)
      Returned container is a list of Book class objects from one specific bookstore stored in a database.
      Book getBookById(int bookId)
      Returned object is stored in a database and is an instance of a Book class.
      boolean updateBook(Book book)
      Updates a book in a database and returns true.

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        boolean addBook(Book book)
        Adds to database a book and returns true. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns false.
        Parameters:
        book - object that will be added.
        Returns:
        true if operation succeed, false if not.

      • addAllBooks

        boolean addAllBooks(List<Book> listOfBooks)
        Adds to database list of books and returns true. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns false.
        Parameters:
        listOfBooks - list of objects that will be added.
        Returns:
        true if operation succeed, false if not.

      • updateBook

        boolean updateBook(Book book)
        Updates a book in a database and returns true. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns false.
        Parameters:
        book - object that will be updated.
        Returns:
        true if operation succeed, false if not.

      • delBook

        boolean delBook(int bookId)
        Deletes a book stored in a database and which ID is sent as an argument and returns false. If connection fails method catches SQLException.
        Parameters:
        bookId - ID of a book that will be deleted.
        Returns:
        false if operation succeed.

      • getAllBooks

        List<Book> getAllBooks()
        Returned container is a list of Book class objects stored in a database. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns null.
        Returns:
        a list of all books contained in a database.

      • getAllBooksForOneBookStore

        List<Book> getAllBooksForOneBookStore(String bookStoreName)
        Returned container is a list of Book class objects from one specific bookstore stored in a database. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns null.
        Parameters:
        bookStoreName - name of a bookstore from which books will be returned.
        Returns:
        a list of all books contained in one specific bookstore in a database.

      • getBookById

        Book getBookById(int bookId)
        Returned object is stored in a database and is an instance of a Book class. It is selected by its ID. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns null.
        Parameters:
        bookId - ID of a book that will be returned.
        Returns:
        a specific book by its ID.
